content: We are having difficulty setting up a zoom watch party using the reach app. At the end it goes to Facebook and gets an error message saying Facebook is not ready. When we try to do the email option instead it just sits and spins.
This is the form I'm having trouble with. I'm on a Google pixel 8. I opened it in Chrome.
Can you try clicking on the link above (it doesn't ask to login on Facebook)?
It will not let me do a virtual event without putting in an address. I live in a motorhome and I'm traveling around the country. What am I supposed to do about that?

So just to be funny I put in Mar-A-Lago as the address. It has work now, at least for doing it via email. But it does seem to be a really bad bug to have virtual clicked and then force us to put in a physical address.
The address is for Mobilize, because its search results for public events are sorted by distance from the attendee.
But virtual is checked. It should not be asking me for a physical address.
Don't worry, I found a workaround but it was pretty annoying at first.
And I suppose the funny thing is mobilize will have all of the events sorted by how close it is to maralago heh heh
